page.title: 08A Day in the Life of Emmy.
page.content: In the morning dad comes in to wake me up at 7.15,then I get up,brush my hair and then get dressed by about 7.30 and I go down to breakfast.For breakfast I usually have toast,except when I feel really hungry then I have cereal.I have finished breakfast by 8 o'clock. After I have cleared up the breakfast things I go upstairs clean my teeth,then I play the recorder until about 8.15 when I go upstairs and mess around with my hair and put in my slides. At 8.30 I go down and open the garage for Mum then do a bit of piano and watch breakfast television if there is anything interesting on. I watch until about 8.40 then I get my coat and bag and go to school.I get there about 8.50 if i go slowly.
